features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication system with JWT tokens, login functionality, and role-based access control (Super Admin and Plant Admins)

features.name: Visitor Registration
features.description: Visitor registration form with photo capture using webcam, form validation, and visitor data submission

features.name: Visitor Search
features.description: Search visitors by mobile number or Aadhar number to auto-fill previous visitor details

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Admin dashboard displaying visitor logs with filtering, search, status management, and statistics

features.name: Visitor Status Management
features.description: Approve, reject, or mark exit for visitors with status updates and entry/exit time tracking

features.name: Visitor Editing
features.description: Edit visitor details through a modal interface

features.name: Visitor Blacklisting
features.description: Blacklist or unblacklist visitors (Super Admin only) to prevent future registrations

features.name: Visitor Deletion
features.description: Soft delete visitor records (Super Admin only)

features.name: Report Generation
features.description: Generate CSV reports of visitors filtered by date range and plant

features.name: Print Slip
features.description: Print visitor pass/slip with visitor details and EHS guidelines

features.name: Photo Upload
features.description: Upload and store visitor photos using Multer file upload middleware

features.name: Database Management
features.description: PostgreSQL database initialization, migrations, and query operations

features.name: Routing
features.description: React Router setup with protected routes and navigation
